string.value: I better stop Juliet before she accidentally poisons Romeo with her toxic cooking skills. I'll need to hurry up and see #bHan the Broker#k so I can buy a recipe for a nice food from him.

Han the Broker was noticeably complaining, and told me if I wanted his #blunchbox recipe#k, then I'll have to fork over #b20,000 mesos#k. That's really pricey, but he's the only way I can acquire the recipe here in Magatia...
I got the recipe from Han the Broker. This recipe also gives me this uneasy feeling. This time, it's not the contents, but the broker himself that worries me...
...what do you want? Information? Items? Or... something more intimate? Just tell me what you want, I can get it for you...for the right price. Hmm? You want a recipe for a delicious dish?

Seriously, who's the absent-minded alchemist this time that's going through a weird experiment? A dish is just a dish... it's not alchemy. How many times do I have to say that? If cooking and alchemy are the same thing, then are all cooks alchemists? If you're asking for a recipe of a weird dish like last time, then I am not selling!

No? It's not for alchemy? It's just for... food? No way! No one in this town is sane enough to think like that... Hmm, looking at your eyes, I can tell you're not lying. Fine, I'm going to fall for this one last time, and I'll sell you a recipe. Do you want to buy one right now?

The recipe will cost you 20,000 mesos. Expensive? Of course it is. You also know that I'm the only one who sells recipes in all of Magatia, right? I've got the market cornered! Once you have 20,000 mesos ready, let me know. I'd hurry if I were you, who knows, maybe the meso will inflate, and I have to charge a few million mesos tomorrow instead of 20,000...

Did I plant a seed of doubt in your head? Alchemists are usually not in the right state of mind, so you never know what they'll do with food. You can't leave them unsupervised with recipes. They'll just cook up a disaster! Ever had Penne Pasta with foxtails with a side of Unagi dip? Trust me, you don't want to!
